newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Spectrum to list on Vancouver Stock Exch..
newsitem.headline: Spectrum to list on Vancouver Stock Exch..

text.p: New Zealand mineral exploration company Spectrum Resources Ltd said on Friday its application for listing on the Vancouver Stock Exchange had been approved.
Spectrum said it would be posted for trading on the Vancouver exchange on Friday.
Its trading symbol would be SPC in Canada, while SPE would be retained for the New Zealand Stock Exchange.
Spectrum owns 100 percent of Asian Mineral Resources and, consequently, has a 70 percent stake in the Ta Khoa nickel province in Vietnam. The company also has Chilean exploration interests.
In March Spectrum reported a loss of NZ$360,000 for the half year to December 31.
